x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
Incorrect checklists are getting attached to the Work Orders.
If there is no checklist mentioned on the Scheduled Maintenance/Work round planned maintenance as well as for the asset or asset category,even then the Checklist is getting associated to the Work orders for the asset.
Issue seen in Pre-Qatar Releases
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Wrong Checklist gets attached to a WO
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation:
There is an Update Set provided by the Product team which solves the issue.
As per the current Logic :-
If any checklist is attached to the Scheduled Maintenance/Work Round/Planned Maintenance the respective system generated rules should get apply and that checklist should be attached to the Work order, else if there is any manual rules for the asset, asset type, etc. that are matching for those work orders then manual one should get apply.
If there is no matching rules then no checklist will get applied on Work Order.
Apply Update Set :- MM-QatarPatch2-MM-8253-Checklist Rule Association
x_nuvo_diag_probes.sys_name: Wrong Checklist gets attached to a WO
